items.title: Dementia housing without locked wards? It's a small but growing movement
items.description: Some senior living communities are caring for people with dementia alongside other residents, not segregated behind locked doors.

items.title: With 'Baby Botox,' young adults strive to keep wrinkles from ever forming
items.description: A growing number of 20-somethings are trying to freeze time with preventative Botox treatments. Here's what's behind the trend.
